title: Vue.js Material Component Framework
description: Vuetify is a semantic development framework for Vue.js. Built with Material Design, it aims to provide all the tools necessary to create beautiful content rich applications.
keywords: vue, vue 2, vue js, vue.js, material design, vue components, material design components, vuetify, vuetify.js

404.title: Whoops, 404
404.description: Whoops, looks like whatever you are looking for is not there!

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get started with Vue and Vuetify in no time. Support for vue-cli-3, existing projects and more.
getting-started/quick-start.keywords: quick start, vuetify templates, installing vuetify, install vuetify

getting-started/starter-templates.title: Starter Templates
getting-started/starter-templates.description: Understand the layout and structure of your application. Check out examples.

getting-started/why-vuetify.title: Why Vuetify?
getting-started/why-vuetify.description: Why you should choose Vuetify over other Vue frameworks.
getting-started/why-vuetify.keywords: why vuetify, why vue, why choose vuetify

getting-started/frequently-asked-questio.title: Frequently asked questions
getting-started/frequently-asked-questio.description: Stuck on a problem? Check these frequently asked questions.

getting-started/meet-the-team.title: Meet the team
getting-started/meet-the-team.description: Meet the team responsible for making Vuetify great. Thank you for supporting Vuetify!
getting-started/meet-the-team.keywords: vuetify dev team, vuetify core team

getting-started/sponsors-and-backers.title: Sponsors and backers
getting-started/sponsors-and-backers.description: Help support Vuetify.js by backing the development of new features

getting-started/contributing.title: Contributing
getting-started/contributing.description: Learn how to help contribute to the Vuetify framework.

getting-started/roadmap.title: Roadmap
getting-started/roadmap.description: The upcoming planned features and new functionality coming to Vuetify. New vue components, new directives, and much much more!.

getting-started/consulting-and-support.title: Consulting & Support
getting-started/consulting-and-support.description: Get help and support from the creator of Vuetify, John Leider

framework/a-la-carte.title: A La Carte
framework/a-la-carte.description: Get ready for automatic treeshaking. Use only the components you need. Single component importing only pulls in what you use.
framework/a-la-carte.keywords: a la carte, a-la-carte, vuetify single import, vuetify import, component importing

framework/icons.title: Installing Icons
framework/icons.description: Vuetify supports custom icon sets through prefixes and global options.
framework/icons.keywords: vue, icon, iconfont, icon libraries, vuetify icons

framework/internationalization.title: Internationalization
framework/internationalization.description: Vuetify supports language internationalization of its components.

framework/transitions.title: Transitions
framework/transitions.description: Make an amazing application with smooth built in animations.

framework/scroll.title: Scroll
framework/scroll.description: Using the goTo helper you can smoothly scroll to any location on the page.

framework/colors.title: Material color palette
framework/colors.description: Easily apply any color from the material design palette.

framework/theme.title: Application theming
framework/theme.description: Setup your application's theme and supplemental colors in a flash.

framework/typography.title: Application typography
framework/typography.description: View the various typography styles. From headings to captions, with various weights and sizes.

framework/content.title: Content styles
framework/content.description: Vuetify has custom styling for default html markup.

framework/pre-made-layouts.title: Application layouts
framework/pre-made-layouts.description: Select from a multitude of official material design layouts.
framework/pre-made-layouts.keywords: pre-defined layouts, layouts, application layout, material design layouts

framework/grid.title: Layout grid system
framework/grid.description: Vuetify supports the material design 12 point grid for laying out your application.

framework/grid-lists.title: Grid List Component
framework/grid-lists.description: Grid lists allow you to specify the gutter used when separating grid items.

framework/breakpoints.title: Breakpoints
framework/breakpoints.description: Access the Vuetify grid system directly in components.

framework/spacing.title: Spacing helpers
framework/spacing.description: Spacing helper classes allow you to apply margin or padding to any element.

framework/alignment.title: Alignment helpers
framework/alignment.description: Alignment helpers assist in modifying your application layout on varying viewport sizes.

framework/display.title: Display helpers
framework/display.description: Display helper classes allow you to control when elements should display based upon viewport.

framework/elevation.title: Elevation helpers
framework/elevation.description: Elevation helper classes allow you to control relative depth, or distance, between two surfaces along the z-axis.

framework/sandbox.title: Sandbox
framework/sandbox.description: Play around with the available configuring options for your next application.

components/api-explorer.title: API Explorer
components/api-explorer.description: Search the API of all Vuetify components.
components/api-explorer.keywords: material design components, components api, vuetify api

components/alerts.title: Alert Component
components/alerts.description: The v-alert component is used to convey information to the user. Designed to stand out, the alerts come in four contextual styles, success, info, warning, and error.

components/app-bars.title: AppBars Component
components/app-bars.description: The v-app-bar component is a supercharged toolbar with advanced scrolling techniques and application layout support.

components/autocompletes.title: Autocomplete Component
components/autocompletes.description: The v-autocomplete component provides type-ahead autocomplete functionality.

components/avatars.title: Avatar Component
components/avatars.description: The v-avatar component is used to control the size and border radius of an image.

components/badges.title: Badges
components/badges.description: Badge component for the Vuetify framework.

components/breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs Component
components/breadcrumbs.description: The v-breadcrumbs component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a Material Icons icon or characters as a divider.

components/bottom-navigation.title: Bottom Navigation Component
components/bottom-navigation.description: The v-bottom-navigation component is primarily for mobile use and acts as the primary navigation.
components/bottom-navigation.keywords: bottom nav, material nav, nav, bottom navigation, navigation

components/bottom-sheets.title: Bottom sheets
components/bottom-sheets.description: The v-bottom-sheets component is used for elevating content above other elements in a dialog style fashion
components/bottom-sheets.keywords: bottom sheets, bottom dialog, bottom modal

components/categories/forms.title: Format components
components/categories/forms.description: Vuetify Components that are useful when building forms

components/categories/navigation.title: Navigation components
components/categories/navigation.description: Vuetify Components that are useful when building forms

components/categories/layout.title: Layout components
components/categories/layout.description: Vuetify Components that are useful when building layouts

components/categories/buttons.title: Buttons & Indicators
components/categories/buttons.description: Vuetify components that are useful for building interactive apps

components/categories/modals.title: Popups & Modals
components/categories/modals.description: Vuetify Components that are useful for showing dynamic content

components/categories/tables.title: Table components
components/categories/tables.description: Vuetify Components that are useful when showing tabular data

components/button-groups.title: Button groups
components/button-groups.keywords: vuetify, buttons, components, groups, button group

components/floating-action-buttons.title: Floating Action Button Component
components/floating-action-buttons.description: Floating Action Button component for Vuetify Framework.
components/floating-action-buttons.keywords: vuetify, buttons, fab, floating button, floating action button

components/combobox.title: Combobox Component
components/combobox.description: The v-combobox component provides type-ahead autocomplete functionality and allows user to provide a custom value.

components/data-iterator.title: Data iterator Component
components/data-iterator.description: The v-data-iterator component is used for displaying data, and shares a majority of its functionality with the v-data-table component. Features include sorting, searching, pagination, and selection.

components/data-tables.title: Data tables Component
components/data-tables.description: The v-data-table component is used for displaying tabular data. Features include sorting, searching, pagination, inline-editing, header tooltips, and row selection.

components/dialogs.title: Dialogs Component
components/dialogs.description: A dialog informs a user about a specific task and may contain critical information.

components/expansion-panels.title: Expansion panel Component
components/expansion-panels.description: Expansion panel component for Vuetify framework.

components/hover.title: Hover Component
components/hover.description: Easily respond when the user hovers over elements

components/inputs.title: Input Component
components/inputs.description: Create customized inputs by extending the v-input component

components/item-groups.title: Item groups
components/item-groups.description: Create dynamic groups for any situation

components/navigation-drawers.title: Navigation drawer
components/navigation-drawers.description: Navigation drawer component for Vuetify Framework

components/paginations.title: Pagination Component
components/paginations.description: The v-pagination component is used to separate long sets of data so that it is easier for a user to consume information.

components/parallax.title: Parallax Component
components/parallax.description: The v-parallax component creates a 3d effect that makes an image appear to scroll slower than the window.

components/date-pickers.title: Date Picker Component
components/date-pickers.description: Date Picker component for the Vuetify framework.

components/time-pickers.title: Time Picker Component
components/time-pickers.description: Time Picker component for the Vuetify framework.

components/progress.title: Progress
components/progress.description: Progress components for the Vuetify framework.

components/ratings.title: Ratings
components/ratings.description: Star rating component for the Vuetify framework.

components/sheets.title: Sheet Component
components/sheets.description: The v-sheet component is the baseline paper element in Vuetify.

components/sliders.title: Slider Component
components/sliders.description: The v-slider component is a better visualization of the number input. It is used for gathering numerical user data.

components/selection-controls.title: Selection controls Input Components
components/selection-controls.description: Selection controls input components for Vuetify Framework

components/selects.title: Selects Input Components
components/selects.description: Selects input components for Vuetify Framework

components/subheaders.title: Subheaders
components/subheaders.description: Subheaders are used for separating lists of content.

components/system-bars.title: SystemBar Component
components/system-bars.description: THe v-system-bar component provides an appplication with an android style status bar.
components/system-bars.keywords: system-bar, android status bar, status bar

components/tabs.title: Tabs
components/tabs.description: Tabs component for the Vuetify framework.

components/timelines.title: Timelines
components/timelines.description: Timeline component for the Vuetify framework.

components/textarea.title: Textareas
components/textarea.description: Textarea component for the Vuetify framework.

components/text-fields.title: Text fields
components/text-fields.description: Text field component for the Vuetify framework.

components/toolbars.title: Toolbars
components/toolbars.description: Toolbars component for the Vuetify framework.

components/tooltips.title: Tooltip
components/tooltips.description: Tooltip components for the Vuetify framework.

components/treeview.title: Treeview
components/treeview.description: Treeview component for the Vuetify framework

components/windows.title: Windows
components/windows.description: Windows components for the Vuetify framework.

directives/resizing.title: Resizing
directives/resizing.description: Resize directive for the Vuetify framework.
directives/resizing.keywords: resize, resize directive, window resize directive

directives/ripples.title: Ripple
directives/ripples.description: Ripple directive for the Vuetify framework.

directives/scrolling.title: Scrolling
directives/scrolling.description: Scroll directive for the Vuetify framework.
directives/scrolling.keywords: scroll, scroll directive, window scroll directive

directives/touch-support.title: Touch Support
directives/touch-support.description: Touch directive for the Vuetify framework.
directives/touch-support.keywords: touch, touch directive, mobile touch directive

examples/layouts/baseline.description: Baseline layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/baselineFlipped.description: Baseline Flipped layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/centered.title: Centered layout example
examples/layouts/centered.description: Centered layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/complex.title: Complex layout example
examples/layouts/complex.description: Complex layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/dark.title: Dark layout example
examples/layouts/dark.description: Dark layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/googleContacts.title: Google Contacts layout example
examples/layouts/googleContacts.description: Google Contacts layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/googleKeep.title: Google Keep layout example
examples/layouts/googleKeep.description: Google Keep layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/googleYoutube.title: Google Youtube layout example
examples/layouts/googleYoutube.description: Google Youtube layout for the Vuetify.js framework

examples/layouts/sandbox.description: Layout Sandbox for the Vuetify.js framework

themes/premium.title: Free / Premium Themes
themes/premium.description: Vuetify offers numerous pre-build starter and premium themes. Kickstart your next application today, no design skills needed.
themes/premium.keywords: vuetify themes, pre-built material themes, premium themes
